DOC.brief_summary: The study randomize clinical trial examine effectiveness massage intermittent pneumatic compression recovery 161-km ultramarathon .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Popular Recovery Techniques Ultramarathon Recovery
DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize clinical trial examine effectiveness massage intermittent pneumatic compression recovery 161-km ultramarathon . Participants 2015 161-km Western States Endurance Run randomize 20-minute post-race intervention massage , intermittent pneumatic compression supine rest . Each subject complete two 400 run maximum speed race , day 3 5 race , also provide muscle pain soreness rating overall muscular fatigue score 7 day race .
DOC.criteria: Entry Western States Endurance Run Failure finish race
